TopicTitle: Go mach speed reverse a few seconds after starting my engines

Articles.Content:
So... i built a plane, and now when i press pitch up 'S' i just go really fast backwards.
The engines don't get thrust when doing this. I'm magically going super fast backwards.
I also found out that after taking off backwards, if i press A or D while pressing S i go even faster, but only in the air.

I will post a youtube video with it.

Windows 10 PRO

Ryzen 9 5900x | RTX 2080Ti | 32Gb DDR4 3200Mhz | 2x m.2 500GB (1 has windows, the game is on the other one)
